adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_three: Spells will affect a gargantuan area around a targeted block.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_aoe_two: Spells will affect a huge area around a targeted block.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_accelerate: Immensely increases the speed of projectile spells.
Greatly increases the speed of projectile spells.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_extendtime: Immensely extends the time that spells last.
Greatly extends the time that spells last.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_spelleffic: Uses a glyph slot to reduce the mana cost of a spell.
adamsarsplus.glyph_desc.glyph_effectdoma: Creates a Sphereical area that applies spells on nearby entities for a short time. Applying Sensitive will make this spell target blocks instead. AOE will expand the effective range, Accelerate will cast spells faster, Dampen will cause the domain to target the outer blocks of the domain if used with sensitive the domain will only target the outer blocks, and Extend Time will increase the duration.
